    • Method Detail

      • sendMail

        public static ErrorCode sendMail(java.lang.String subject,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 java.lang.String recipient)
        Send a mail with the given parameters. Starts a new thread so other threads will not be blocked.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject of the mail
        text - The text to send
        recipient - The recipient
        Returns:
        Returns

        ErrorCode.SUCCESS

        if there are no errors. Otherwise a fitting ErrorCodde will be returned.
